N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 800.2 - Statutory provisions

State Regulations

Labor Law, section 27-a, subdivision 4a, requires the

Commissioner of Labor by rule and regulation to adopt, for the protection of
the safety and health of public employees, all safety and health standards
promulgated under the United States Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970
( Public Law
91-596
) in effect on December 27, 1980, and to promulgate and
repeal such rules and regulations as may be necessary to conform to the
standards established pursuant to that Federal enactment. Notes
